revised_title: Anastomosis of Nerves Supplying Limb Muscles: Restoration of Paralyzed Muscles
tldr: The author investigates nerve anastomosis in limb muscles, focusing on anastomosis of the nerves supplying limb muscles. The study examines various experiments and their results, discussing factors that determine the date of recovery and the necessity for precaution to prevent the formation of communications with the central ends of nerves.
